title: PMS 2.0 353 - JJ Watt No Longer In Houston, Kyle Van Noy, Ian Rapoport, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat and the boys discuss all the different NFL rumors circulating around this week including Russell Wilson out in Seattle, Dak Prescott in Dallas, Carson Wentz, and much more. Joining the program is 2x Super Bowl Champion, member of the 2010's New England Patriots All-Decade Team, LB for the Miami Dolphins, friend of the show, Kyle Van Noy from his Bentley with the top down to chat about his season, what they need to do to get over the top, his relationship with Tom and Gronk, and what he has planned for the offseason (20:40-46:06). Next, NFL Network Insider and friend of the program, Ian Rapoport joins the show to chat about all the different rumors floating around the NFL and where he thinks a number of different QB's will wind up (47:56-1:09:00). Later, Pat and AJ Hawk  chat about JJ Watt officially asking for his release from the Texans, Jack Easterby and Cal McNair, and everything else as we approach the end of the first week of the offseason. Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
